publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2279# Tavish Scott: Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery-That the Parliament notes the Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery to be put to WWF's Oceans Recovery Campaign conference on 23 October 2001; agrees that our seas are in urgent need of sensible and sensitive management if they are to support abundant fish stocks, viable populations of marine wildlife and thriving coastal communities, and calls on the Scottish Executive to work with Her Majesty's Government, devolved bodies and all stakeholders to develop a co-ordinated stewardship strategy for our seas. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone*, John Farquhar Munro*, Robin Harper*
S1M-2279# Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery (lodged on 1 October 2001) Bruce Crawford*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Richard Lochhead*, Nora Radcliffe*, Iain Smith*, Robert Brown*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2279# Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery (lodged on 1 October 2001) Irene McGugan*, Elaine Thomson*, Mr John Home Robertson*, George Lyon*, Fiona McLeod*, Ian Jenkins*
S1M-2279# Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery (lodged on 1 October 2001) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Helen Eadie*
S1M-2279# Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery (lodged on 1 October 2001) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S1M-2279# Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery (lodged on 1 October 2001) Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2279# Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery (lodged on 1 October 2001) Michael Russell*
S1M-2279# Edinburgh Declaration for Ocean Recovery (lodged on 1 October 2001) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Murray Tosh*
